body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Michael Young and I represent StayRelax Hotels.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I know your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Michael, my name is Sandra Washington.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to book a room for one zero zero zero dollars per night.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I can help with that. Can you please provide me with your email address and contact number for the booking?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My email address is sandra@example.com and my contact number is five five five- two three four- one zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. I have noted your details. Is there anything else you would like to inquire about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your assistance, Michael.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sandra. If you need any further help, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
